metadata.title: CVE-2025-0240 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Parsing a JavaScript module as JSON could, under some circumstances, causecross-compartment access, which may result in a use-after-free. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 134, Firefox ESR < 128.6, Thunderbird <134, and Thunderbird < 128.6.

criterions.comment: mozjs78: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs91: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs102: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
